output_list.reason: Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'balanceOf[_from] -= _value + burnPerTransaction'.
Integer overflow in transfer function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'balanceOf[msg.sender] -= _value + burnPerTransaction'.
Bad randomness in transferFrom function allows attackers to always win the lottery and cause a large increase in the contract's total supply.
Bad randomness in transfer function allows attackers to always win the lottery and cause a large increase in the contract's total supply.
Access control issue in transferFrom function allows attackers to steal any arbitrary user's assets.
